text: Moby or Richard Melville Hall (born September 11, 1965Moby's bio from his official website , accessed 25 April 2008) is an American DJ, songwriter and musician. He is famous for his songs "Porcelain" and " why does my heart feel so bad ". The video for another one of his songs, We are all made of stars shows him dressed as an astronaut in a space suit. He was a member of a punk band called Vatican Commandos before becoming a DJ. In 2002, Moby started a cafe called Teany with his ex-girlfriend Kelly Tisdale. He is a vegan. ==References== Category:American DJs Category:Musicians from Connecticut Category:American rock musicians Category:American punk musicians Category:American songwriters Category:1965 births Category:Living people
title: Moby
